title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your determination helps you solve a perplexing problem. The solution likely wont come easily, but the collaborative spirit of the Aquarius Moon prompts you to talk the situation over with others and trust that their wisdom will provide the answers you need. Keep active with your hands as you envision all the possibilities. Inspiration shows up in mysterious ways. Your persistence is a sign of faith. Inventor Thomas Edison said, Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
